amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 531 concerning funds for public charter schools in the District of Columbia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 531 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Knollenberg amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Knollenberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Knollenberg amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
